LanguageData.BaselinersImmuneDesc: Baseliners cannot get oripathy or blood originium buildup.\n\nOriginium will never harm you.
LanguageData.InfectionMonitorDesc: Infection monitors are required to show oripathy and originium buildup severities.
LanguageData.AbandonOripathicCorpsesDesc: Automatically abandon oripathic corpses when an infected dies in a caravan. Avoids infecting other caravan members.
